article.title: Notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing

obligation.description: The controller shall communicate any rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing.
conditions: Carried out in accordance with Article 16
Carried out in accordance with Article 17(1)
Carried out in accordance with Article 18

recipients.definition: Each recipient to whom the personal data have been disclosed.

data_subject_information.description: The controller shall inform the data subject about those recipients.
data_subject_information.condition: If the data subject requests it
